s1.title: 19 April 2002 - New Committers
s1.p: Welcome Jeremias Maerki, Joerg Pietschmann and Peter B. West!

s1.title: 11 March 2002 - Fop 0.20.3 released
s1.p:
This is a maintenance release, the first version which supports the XSL-FO Recommendation syntax. See the
announcement for more information.
